Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Law Enforcement District -- 12 Mills Tax - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of St. Bernard, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of twelve (12) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $4,728,696 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of providing additional funding for the St. Bernard Parish Sheriff's Office to provide continued and expanded law enforcement services to the citizens of St. Bernard Parish, including payment of deputy salaries, equipment and training?
